title: DMK Bootcd V0.1 (Ghost for OSX & Systeminfo)
description:
DMK Bootcd V0.1 - Bootcd for intel macs
----------------------------------------

- Symantec Ghost V11.0.1 with USB support (HFS+ to NTFS/FAT32)

so now you can make a full backup, including firmwarepartition to your external usb harddisk! (It will take many hours, depending on how compatible your usbdrive is with the driver,so be patient). It is a bit-for-bit backup, so its not like any backup tools that OSX has to offer (like superduper, ....)

- Symantec Ghost V11.0.1 with network support (macbook 15inch and probably some other)

- Systeminfo (hardware info), buggy! Only the first few pages work. Working on it!

- Tool to Eject CD (because there is no eject button on my macbook pro)
Now I can swap my cd for another cd with DOS tools on it, without rebooting.

More information in the readme.txt. Always read the readme.txt first!


I made this bootcd just for fun, but be free to ask for more info or tell me what you like or dislike about it.

Another version will probably be created in the near future...

Greetz,
DMK
